text: Emmett O' Brien Technical High School, or O' Brien Tech, is a technical high school located in Ansonia, Connecticut. It is in the Connecticut Technical High School System. O' Brien Tech receives students from many nearby towns. ==Technologies== In addition to a complete academic program leading to a high school diploma,O' Brien Tech - Academic Offerings students attending O' Brien Tech receive training in one of the following trades and technologies:O' Brien Tech - Technologies * Automotive Technology * Carpentry * Culinary Arts * Electrical * Hairdressing and Cosmetology * Health Technology * Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning (HVAC) * Information Technology * Mechanical Design and Engineering Technology * Precision Machining Technology == Athletics == Fall * Football * Soccer * Volleyball * Powderpuff Winter * Girls Basketball * Boys Basketball Spring * Baseball * Softball * Outdoor track * Golf == References == == External links== *O'Brien Technical High School Category:Buildings and structures in Ansonia, Connecticut Category:Schools in New Haven County, Connecticut Category:Public high schools in Connecticut
title: Emmett O'Brien Technical High School
